mapper.insert: insert into setmeal (category_id, name, price, status, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{status}, #{description}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime},#{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select:
select s.*, c.name as categoryName from setmeal s left outer join category c on s.category_id = c.id
and s.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and s.category_id like concat('%', #{categoryId}, '%')
and s.status like concat('%', #{status}, '%')
order by s.create_time desc
